title: Extracts from the Weekly Circular of Messrs. Valentine and Co. on Currency
description: Excerpt from Extracts From the Weekly Circular of Messrs. Valentine and Co. On Currency Such extracts, however, often tell with greater force than an elaborate treatise; because they are the Spontaneous thoughts of a man of business, arising out of the events occurring around him, and which no small degree of inï¬‚uence upon the affairs of his house.
